She was the first ocean liner to have an indoor swimming pool and Turkish bath.

she was used as a troop ship throughout WWI and survived without incident.

the 4th of 4 sisters, she was the only one that was never the largest ship in the world

you can see the White Star line family resemblance to the Olympic class.
